name: Metal Hive
description:
Metal Hive is a fast paced 2d Topdown game were positioning and dashing is the key.
Survive all of the 3 different types of challenges : Fighting your way through enemies or survive all the dangerous traps along the way and see if you are worthy of the final challenge !


This is part of a school project, therefore its still a game in development. 

Please Enjoy !!!

Game made by :
Francisco Almeida
Francisco Pinto 
Rafael Ferreira 
Gabriel Ferreira 
Marlon Faria
